radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver has normal echotexture. There are no focal hepatic lesions. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation. There are numerous small mobile gallstones within the gallbladder. The gallbladder is not distended. There is no wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. The common bile duct measures 6 mm. The head of the pancreas is normal. The body and tail are obscured by overlying bowel gas. The spleen measures 12 cm, top normal.
